name: Skeleton Crew (itch) (gridbugs)
description:
You awake from cryosleep deep in space. The ship's computer informs you that it woke you as the rest of the crew had mysteriously died. But what's that sound from outside your room?

Fight a variety of undead enemies with a variety of weapons on a procedurally
generated spaceship. Damaging the hull of the ship causes sections of the ship
to be depressurized, and their contents sucked into space, including you!

This was my entry for the 7 Day Roguelike game jam in 2016.
